title: Trump Hosts Freed Hostages
body: President Donald Trump invites 20 Israeli hostages freed from Hamas captivity to the White House on Nov 20, sending a US plane to bring them directly to Washington.

title: Chareidi Teen Abused on Bus
body: A 17-year-old chareidi boy was allegedly harassed and psychologically abused by an Arab bus driver on his way to Meron. Police closed the case without pursuing it, sparking outrage in Israel.
